body_html: Thanks. Looking through functional.py it appears that you may just need to add a dilation parameter (currently just set to 1). I'm sure there is some issues to address wrt the transpose though, and of course testing.
body_text: Thanks.  Looking through functional.py it appears that you may just need to add a dilation parameter (currently just set to 1).  I'm sure there is some issues to address wrt the transpose though, and of course testing.
body: Thanks.  Looking through `functional.py` it appears that you may just need to add a `dilation` parameter (currently just set to 1).  I'm sure there is some issues to address wrt the transpose though, and of course testing.
